name: Create a Reply.io contact from a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and push it to a sequence
description:
Every time a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet is added, Make will automatically create a Reply.io contact and push it to a campaign (sequence).

The template uses [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17ZG5QB9GU09Yu8Ios0wfNPNu0ljeT6-lLBU5PaWznOQ/edit?usp=sharing).
